ns3:promotion.ns3:description: Customers agreeing to a 24-month contract will receive $240 in bill credits which will be applied to the cost of the modem as well as the activation fee.
ns3:promotion.ns3:qualification: Acceptance of the promotion requires a 24-month commitment; if a customer terminates within the first year a $10/month early termination fee will be assessed for all remaining months left in the service agreement.
ns3:promotion.ns3:conditions: Limited-time non-transferable offer via windstream.com only for residential customers. Subject to availability credit approval and Windstream Terms and Conditions at windstream.com/terms and Windstream�s acceptable use policy at windstream.net. Details: Must be new High-Speed Internet (HSI) customer subscribing to select HSI plans to qualify. 24-month HSI contract required. Early termination fee of $10 per month(s) remaining applies if HSI is terminated before end of 24 months. High-Speed Internet includes Internet transport Internet access and unlimited incoming calls. Outbound calls except for toll free and 911 will be charged at 10 cents/minute. Operator Service and 411 will be charged the tariffed rates. No features or long-distance carrier allowed. Higher Internet speeds are available for an additional charge. Speeds are distance-sensitive and availability varies by address. Windstream cannot guarantee speeds or uninterrupted error-free service. Other conditions may apply. Instant Credits: One-time bill credit of $165 and one-time bill credit of $75 for new HSI customers applies. Windstream and the Windstream logo are registered service marks of Windstream Corporation. � 2012 Windstream Corporation.
